message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping to get a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9000?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $10500?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $11200. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand this is your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $11000?
